RMB PAY PAY record E-bank pay alipay outward remittance account remittance name remittance amount remittance instruction submit please follow the below step to operate
1、Login your payment account number,then enter into "i want to pay“ 。 2、When outward remittance success，the system will be automatically paid the remittance amount into your account,if unpaid due to the incorrect comments,please contact customer service to solve。 3、It is suggest to use alipay and bank card pay ,when you top-up,please input the requirement information in the comments。 4、When you top-up the remittance,please ensure remark the postscript in the "Pay instruction" or "the payee ps" according to the system requirement,otherwise the system cannot identity to result the top-up failure。\n 5、Please don't use the overdue and unpaid link to prepaid,all need use the timely payment type to do the remittance。
RMB withdrawa withdraw record select bank type enter the bank number re-enter the bank number payee name please input the bank branch withdraw amount transaction password withdraw withdraw notice
1.To ensure your account safe,the Max limitation of RMB withdrawal is ￥5000 one time。\n 2.The min limitation of withdrawal is ￥100,the service fee of withdrawal is 5%,if you have more requirement，please contact the website customer service。\n 3.The withdrawal is paid into account within 24 hours,the bank card withdraw the different bank,the actual payment time maybe have overdue。
